activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.musicplayer.activities.SplashActivity
activities.summary: The `SplashActivity` is designed to serve as a transitional screen that initializes quickly and then redirects the user to the main `MainActivity`. It is commonly used for brand or logo display before the application's main interface is loaded.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.musicplayer.activities.MainActivity

activities.summary: The MainActivity is the central hub of the music player application, handling user interactions such as displaying the main interface, managing playlists, and accessing additional features like settings and equalizer.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.musicplayer.activities.WidgetConfigureActivity

dynamic_property.effect: acts as a container for the widget's content.
displays the background of the widget.
holds the song information elements.
displays the title of the current song.
displays the artist of the current song.
includes the control elements for the widget.

activities.summary: The activity is used for configuring a music player widget, including setting background and text colors, as well as saving and updating the widget's appearance.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.commons.activities.AboutActivity
activities.summary: The AboutActivity is an informational activity within the app, typically used to display information about the app such as its version, credits, and other details.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.commons.activities.CustomizationActivity
activities.summary: The CustomizationActivity is designed to allow users to personalize various settings related to the app's appearance and functionality.

static_properties.text: Excluding a folder will prevent the displaying of all audio files within. Files manually added to playlists will not be affected.
Excluding a folder will prevent the displaying of all audio files within. Files manually added to playlists will not be affected.
